title: [Large-scale] Internet Safety Practices: Multi-risk Prevention Expert Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic internet usage experience and understanding of digital literacy
context.additional_context: Blended education emphasizing smartphone-based learning activities, combining in-person sessions with asynchronous mobile platform learning

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain eight major internet risk factors (cyberbullying, problematic internet use, etc.)
Learners can apply preventive strategies for each risk factor to practical cases and implement them
Learners can develop personal and organizational-level action plans to enhance digital safety

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
